alignRight.description: Aligns the cell content to the right of its parent.

children.description: Content rendered inside the DataList cell (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the DataList cell

isFilled.description: Enables the body Content to fill the height of the card

isIcon.description: Set to true if the cell content is an Icon

wrapModifier.description: Determines which wrapping modifier to apply to the DataListCell
